title: #5- 1 Br/1 Bath Furnished apt near TX Med Ctr; Rice Univ, Univ of Hstn
map_address: 3831 North Braeswood Blvd near Stella Link
app_fee: $60.  Waived for students with valid student ID.
posting_body: *** Short term lease only between August 2 and September 23.
New AC, new laminated floor and fresh paint.
Rates shown are for students and medical residents with 12-month lease.
For other than students or medical residents and rates for 4-to-9-month lease, the rent is 20% higher.
Furnished or unfurnished one bedroom/one bath apartment near the Texas Medical Center, Rice University, University of Houston, and Houston Downtown.
Wireless Internet and all utilities included with electricity up to $150/month ($5/day).

Features queen size bed, full size kitchen (gas stove/oven, full size refrigerator and microwave), full bath, sofa/love seat/ coffee table/TV in living room, dining table and chairs, brand new central AC/Heating, washer/dryer in the same building, covered parking, safe neighborhood, close to shopping centers, ball games and entertainment and much more.
Apartment number 5 on the second floor.
Deposit is $400 per person and is refunded at move out less $120 cleaning/disinfection charge.
Biking trail, Public Library, Public Park and the YMCA are within a walking distance.
Bus Stop (#4) is in our front yard with bus every 10 minutes to Texas Medical Center, Rice University, University of Houston and downtown (save gas, parking, and car repairs).
Quite hours between 10:30 pm and 6:30 am.
